website_summaries.verdict: This pool table proves that you can experience regulation-like play on a smaller model. It's also suitable for pool aficionados with limited space.
pros: In spite of being a compact, space-saving 6' model, this pool table has a strong build that will hold up to serious play
Legs fold, which is a nice feature if you ever need to take it down and store it
cons: Heavier than expected for a 6' model, but that's also a testament to its durability

customer_reviews.title: Portable Fun
customer_reviews.text: Pool table is very level and the surface plays fast, probably because the felt has never been used. The balls that were included are pretty nice and also glide across the felt effortlessly because the high shine. I like the fact that I can easily fold the legs and store in the closet when not in use. The overall size is just right for the space that was available where the table will be used most. Being able to store easily and move to other locations in the house is an added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Mykal Gotti

customer_reviews.title: Great pool table for the home.
customer_reviews.text: Great pool table for the beginner and home with limited space. The Product came well packaged and easy to assemble. I highly recommend two people when flipping over the table, otherwise damage to the legs. The pool balls are located in a small rectangular box. Check before throwing out the box. The product was heavier than expected,solid, and leveled. The table looks great in my basement. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Firefly

customer_reviews.title: great for the man cave
customer_reviews.text: This table is great for playing in the garage. Aside from being a bit smaller, it plays just like the tables at the billiards bar I used to frequent. It is a bit heavy for one person to set up by themselves, but that weight means extra stability. The included cues are utter garbage, but other than that this is a great buy
customer_reviews.author: Brandon N.

customer_reviews.title: Plays well
customer_reviews.text: Plays well but this is not for the serious pool player but for the wife and I it works just fine. We needed something we could move out of the way and this did the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended. Great table, great play, great value!
customer_reviews.text: Great table. Level. Full sized balls.Good lively play. Fantastic value for the money. I was very pleasantly surprised at the high quality. I couldn't be happier. Only small negative is the cues are kind of low end, but that was expected..
customer_reviews.author: mick

customer_reviews.title: A few flaws
customer_reviews.text: A couple of the plastic rims were not stapled in securely and came out. Very frustrating for such an expensive (and not easily returnable item). Also, when folding it up, the legs do not fold in flush and lock in. It makes it hard to move it around when folded up because you have to hold the legs so they won’t fall open. If it weren’t for these things, we would be happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Hoyt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my home.
customer_reviews.text: I have always wanted a pool table but didnt have the space for a permanent one. This allows me to play a nice game of pool in my home without having to go pay at a billiards joint where the pool sharks circle. It is very heavy and unless you're the hulk you may want to get some help putting it into place so that you dont stress the legs. If placed on a hard surface it will slide if you bump into it. To keep it from slipping on our hardwood floors we put small circular non-slip furniture pads beneath the leveling feet.
customer_reviews.author: Navi

customer_reviews.title: Great table, as long as you keep your expectations in check.
customer_reviews.text: Good table. Suits my needs. You get what you pay for. If you're looking for a very casual game with friends or are a newbie looking to learn before buying a real table, this is a good table. If you want a real table, you'll need to spend at least a thousand dollars. No way around it. Had to buy my own cues though. The ones that came with the table were too crooked, even for a newbie
customer_reviews.author: David Chon

customer_reviews.title: True Billiards
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical about purchasing a pool table that is portable, not anymore. The Fat Cat is the next best thing to a professional table in your home. I did not have to balance or worry about the construction, it's great. We have been playing night and day and being a good pool player it feels and reacts just like your 8' - 9' tables. a great buy for the money. Caution there are alot of portable pool tables that look good and cheaper but you will regret passing up on this one. 5 Stars
customer_reviews.author: J. Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Best Christmas Present Ever!
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old son recently caught the billiards bug and has drug me out to Main Event several times over the last couple of months to play pool. I surprised him with his table for Christmas, and after several days of use the verdict is in, Best Christmas Present Ever! The table is great, and is exactly what we wanted, and all for less than $450, you can’t beat it! The table itself is very level and was very easy to setup. If you’re on the fence on this one, get off the fence and pick it up!
customer_reviews.author: brigadeer

customer_reviews.title: 2 thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: This table is huge & its heavy. Its adult size. You need room for it!! Its really sturdy. Everything is so far so good. When I first got it one set of my legs were clued down to the table...idk how the company managed to do that. But I was determined to play after waiting almost 3wks for it. 4 taps with A flat head & hammer did the job Thank God! The legs are fine no damage done. I'm glad I got it for the price I did. You guys better purchase before the price increases. As I can see it already has.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control. Cosmetic damage during manufacturing. But still a nice solid table.
customer_reviews.text: The table seems well built. The one star is for quality control. The damage to this table was not from shipping. This is during assembly at the plant. Both side pockets and 2 corners are cosmetic damages. The table is playable and sturdy. Kids love it. I will be calling the company and Amazon to discuss repair etc.
customer_reviews.author: BobbyD

customer_reviews.title: We're satisfied
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect for our space. 10'x20' room. Any smaller space would be tricky without using shorter sticks. The bumpers are the only thing we can't stand. They are virtually not responsive. At some point, I'll be replacing them. The felt is a bit nappy and does the balls down allot.. Just too thick. The look is amazing. Had quite a few scratches from delivery on the metal corners, but it works and was not worth boxing back up for exchange
customer_reviews.author: smbk25

customer_reviews.title: But this table!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this pool table! It was packaged beautifully so there was no damage. And we’ve had hours and hours of fun with it. We did buy heavier sticks and 2” balls to replace the full-size ones that came with the set. The full-size balls felt like clown balls on the 6ft table, and after playing with them for just a few days, they chipped. But the table itself is well worth the money — especially now during COVID when we’re all looking for things to do at home.
customer_reviews.author: Book Addict FL

customer_reviews.title: Don't do it
customer_reviews.text: Levelers broke first day.4 corners where plastic looking steel all came with scratches. Also when ordering for delevery from kotulas was the worse experience I've ever had on this planet Earth.
customer_reviews.author: Rivera Family

customer_reviews.title: Great table for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great table for the price. Packaged very well so that was a plus! Some repair spots and traces of glue from the manufacturing process I really did not care for. The surface is a hard wood sheet not a slab, to be expected at this price point, which tends to slow the balls down. Great for our family to play and have fun. The ques are ok, you are better of purchasing others. It levels out just fine with little variation throughout the table.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff J

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and will recommend
customer_reviews.text: This pool table was way better then we expected it to be. People say it’s good for kids, but adults have fun with it too. We don’t have space for a full size table so this one works perfectly. It is a good solid table. My dad used to shoot pool with the professional players, and he loves having this table at the house. Gives my 80 year old parents something fun to enjoy everyday now.
customer_reviews.author: Karen R

customer_reviews.title: Good table for the value
customer_reviews.text: This table was ready to be played out of the box. The only set up needed was the screws to lock legs and then two people to lift and place. I’ve had this for a week and play around 10-15 times a day and have had zero issues. The only cons for me are that the pool cues were lightweight with bad tips and that the corners have a chrome finish that can be very distracting. I would suggest to purchase a set of sticks. Overall, good table for the value.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee

customer_reviews.title: I Love It!!
customer_reviews.text: My pool table is perfect fit for my sunroom. When I’m ready to use it, we turn it around because it very portable. It is not too big and not too small. Just right to have a fun game of pool, Rack’em up!!
customer_reviews.author: Walter B. Milton

customer_reviews.title: great entertainment
customer_reviews.text: This is a great starter set for young folks and it helps get them off their phones. One, it is easy to set up and level. Two, people can move it and the legs will fold up. Three, It has regulation pieces with it so you can begin play immediately. All the kids in the neighborhood are lining up to play my grandson. We set it ours up in the garage. The price is a tad high, however, it is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Military History Nut

customer_reviews.title: Excellent budget pool table !
customer_reviews.text: Nice garage / rec room pool table. It’s not a bad budget alternative to a larger table. If youre looking for slate quality play then dont even bother getting this. This is essentially composite board play surface. Bumpers rebound decently. Fun for everyone - make sure to level it checking for accuracy with an actual bubble level. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: MMC M.D.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, you should not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: The packaging was excellent. I literally had to break into get the items out. I got the table legs assembled properly and then, I saw a nice sized scratch on the silver part of one of the pockets along with a smudge of what looks to me to be a light colored paint. For the amount of money spent to purchase this item, I believe something should be done to take care of that. I will be contacting the company about. assembling it and placing it where you want it to sit. Luckily, I was able to do it myself. Other than that, I am totally pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good table for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: The table is the perfect size and plays well. It was delivered to the doorstep and packaged well. It takes 2 people to set it up. The balls and sticks are fine. The only problem is the felt is too thin and wearing. We have a tear in less than a month of use. I would still recommend the table for the money. I’ve called but not been able to get anyone. I am going to try and e-mail.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa E Winton

customer_reviews.title: Good enough table
customer_reviews.text: Very solid and easy to set up, get what you pay for but balls don't move effortlessly as they would on a true table and balls don't bank against rails as they would either. But all in all for the price I paid its a good starter table until i am ready to move up.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Fun and worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The majority of the reviews are correct. Great table for the price! Movable. Yet a fun table. If you’re a super crazy pool player... maybe not the table for you? Yet If you’re a moderate to semi serious pool player... YES YES AND YES. Super fun for me and the hubby. Also fun for our little parties in our pub room. Great purchase
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca3

customer_reviews.title: Fun table to have in the garage
customer_reviews.text: Fun table to have in the garage. I would have preferred one a little bit bigger but designed like this one. Table was packaged well and easy to assemble. Delivered to garage door was very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: olga

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size For Small Gameroom
customer_reviews.text: Very easy set-up. Packaged well with no defects. Table was perfectly level out of box. Perfect size for tight spots. Very pleased and highly recommend for smaller area. Has the feel of a normal pool table.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Twain

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality, price was fair for a pool table that can be folded up and put away. Only con I wish it raised up higher for taller people, the bottom of the legs do raise up but not high enough and sometimes needed to use to level the table. Don’t mind the wooden boards on the floor, our condo floors aren’t level so we had to use those to bring it up a bit and level it.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Colon

customer_reviews.title: Great value for your money
customer_reviews.text: My 10 and 20 year old sons love their new pool table! It is the perfect size for a small basement and easy to move around. It was very easy to set up. It is sturdy and looks great. We are very happy with our purchase!
customer_reviews.author: HSB

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent table. Well built. Very well packaged upon delivery. 2 people a must to flip over. Been playing on for a week with no issues. Recommend black chalk for cues because it doesn't leave blue chalk marks on table. Almost level right out of box. Excellent buy. Pick up some better cues and you are ready to play.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Harbaugh

customer_reviews.title: Stay away
customer_reviews.text: Worst product - keep away I sent product back still no refund;stay away
customer_reviews.author: AmazedCust

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Everything came as expected and in a timely matter.
customer_reviews.author: Steve P Mullin Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Very please with this product. So far we’ve had some good game nights with friends. If I had any issue to nitpick it would be that it’s not as easily portable as I thought. It’s very heavy, but sturdy. My plan was to move it in and out of storage as needed, but I definitely need another hand.
customer_reviews.author: Sanchiesan

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is a great alternative to a full on heavy and expensive pool table. I really like the regulation sized balls-not miniature ones that are unrealistic. I would definitely recommend and buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy of Girls

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: This pool table came and ripped the felt was ripped on the top when I took it out of the box!! Now I have to somehow repair the felt not really happy about this usually Amazon is good but this was terrible all that money I paid
customer_reviews.author: scott waldron

customer_reviews.title: Screws to short and felll out.
customer_reviews.text: It a sturdy pool table after a few minor modification . The is issue was when I set it up some of the screws fell out and would not stay in place. Ended up having to glue the threads of the screw to make it stay. After that set up easy and it was real sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Tober

customer_reviews.title: Great table for small area
customer_reviews.text: It arrived as scheduled. Packed well. Heavy for a single carry. Will need a dolly or another person to carry. Set up was easy. And decent size for small rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable
customer_reviews.text: Its a decent, heavy table. I like that it can fold up but if you live by yourself its pretty difficult to put up and take down. The leveling things on the legs are just glued in, they broke almost immediately after having to adjust them a few times. The felt also feels pretty cheap. Its a decent thing for the price and it comes basically already assembled, but if youve got the money, get a nicer one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Condition Received
customer_reviews.text: Received the table yesterday. There was no visible damage to the box. However when we unpacked it. Three of the four corners have visible markings from the packaging itself. Tried to rub them out to no avail. Table plays well, but I am disappointed with these conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GAME NIGHT
customer_reviews.text: Great for any game night, any pool lover, sturdy table, good on bank shots and all. It's worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Vonnieson!

customer_reviews.title: Nice table for kids in the basement.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice table for the kids. It has a real feel and they enjoy playing on it. The quality is good for the price range. I paid to have it delivered in the house. It proves to be quite heavy to life and put together but 2 of us did the job in a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: Euclid

customer_reviews.title: Terrific pool table!
customer_reviews.text: Just so much fun! I love that it is foldable, and the 6 foot length is perfect for us.
customer_reviews.author: Natnmargie

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for our 7th anniversary and he loves it. The only thing he didn't like was the pool stick b/c it has the wooden tips. I would definitely recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Hines

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just got our pool table. My husband is loving it so much he playing by himself. Lol Money well-spent.
customer_reviews.author: Brigitte Woodward

customer_reviews.title: Awesome table!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this table. Exceeded my expectations. Delivery was prompt and the table was well packaged. Plays well and looks great! The only negative are the cue sticks but that was to be expected.
customer_reviews.author: Mylene

customer_reviews.title: Awful!
customer_reviews.text: Screws that hold table together all fell out and were too short . Came without balls. Disappointed as this was Christmas gift. Will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Carol C.

customer_reviews.title: Great table and price !
customer_reviews.text: The kids and myself love this table. It set up so easy and it was level, no adjusting was needed.
customer_reviews.author: Daily Writer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Not very stable, balls lose momentum once they hit the sides. Netting it cheap. The stapples for the pockets come off. Not really worth what i paid for. Itll do if your not a big billards fan. But i would advise not buying if you really enjoy the game.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Elegance
customer_reviews.text: Now here, you have a very happy camper. This is a beautiful, classy, sharp pool table.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: A tad smaller than i expected but still a great asset to have in the house
customer_reviews.text: I really adore this table. It is smaller than i expected but friends game over with the idea, "oh that's cute" but then it was a big hit and everyone wanted to keep playing pool all night. No complaints here. I got the black one so i got black chalk with it. Still looks clean and sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: just a entertainment.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter make it her past time , if she feel bored this summer she invite friends in the house, play billiard.
customer_reviews.author: Outcorrection

customer_reviews.title: Good table
customer_reviews.text: Worth it. Very clean and easy to move while being quality
customer_reviews.author: Rugbeg

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for the whole family.
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! A bit heavier than described, but our whole family has enjoyed this Christmas gift!
customer_reviews.author: M B

customer_reviews.title: Balls were not included
customer_reviews.text: This table did not arrive with balls as shown in the picture. What a disappointment Christmas morning to not even be able to play!!
customer_reviews.author: Allison Goode

customer_reviews.title: Good table for the money.
customer_reviews.text: This table is very good for the money. If you want a more stable, faster, better looking table you should look at more expensive options. If you want a nice, economical, somewhat portable table that plays pretty well this is a really good choice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We love this pool table!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My family absolutely loves this pool table. We got a new home and this pool table was perfect for the family room. It’s super sturdy and looks great. I would definitely recommend getting this table.
customer_reviews.author: Clarisa Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. No issues, easy to set up and to level. Overall very happy and love to play with the table. Highly recommended and can’t beat the price for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Schultz

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: Its amazing! my husband loves this gift.. he's been playing none stop. But just a FYI its really heavy you need about two people to flip the table.. the size is great 👍 my husband is 6'2 and its perfect
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer goyco

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to our home.
customer_reviews.text: Overall we are happy with this purchase. My only gripe is the pool sticks that came with the table. They are trash! Could’ve at least came with better quality equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Sp

customer_reviews.title: Back leg was glued to table!
customer_reviews.text: On the back of the pool table , the leg was glued to back of the pool table and it looks real bad and paint pulled up! Don’t know why there would be clue on the back of that!
customer_reviews.author: roger edwards

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. Already came put together, only had to add 4 screws for supports and then turn it over. That’s it. Very happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: We love our pool table. Just wished the sticks were a better quality.
customer_reviews.author: VENUS N.

customer_reviews.title: Great Value and well made.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Very pleased with this purchase. Definately not the hathaway which is a step down from this great table!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jamaal Johnson

customer_reviews.title: TRASH!!! THE FEET WERE LOOSE, TOP HAD HOLES AND SUPER SCRATCHED
customer_reviews.text: IT WAS A WASTE OF TIME PUTTING IT TOGETHER, THE BOX WAS RIPPED. ALL THE TABLE CORNER WERE REALLY SCRATCHED, IT WAS MISSING ITEMS. ALSO, BALLS DONT ROLL AS SMOOTH.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaly

customer_reviews.title: Needs to be put together better without the screws falling out
customer_reviews.text: I took it out the box and the screws came out from underneath but other than that it’s a good quality table
customer_reviews.author: Isom

customer_reviews.title: Good table
customer_reviews.text: Great for tweens/ kids learning to play pool. Not to heavy that it can be moved around with 2 people.
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was an amazing pool table. Was easy to fold up and assemble
customer_reviews.author: Logan

customer_reviews.title: Amzing for its price
customer_reviews.text: This table was extremely good for its price. I would r3ccomend it to anyone thinking to buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Divyam Kumar

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very well done pool table especially for the price you can’t beat it !
customer_reviews.author: Angel T.

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Pool table is pretty solid, not flimsy. Chrome corners seem cheap and we’re damaged in shipping and had some bubbles in the felt on the side cushions.
customer_reviews.author: Big Red

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Love it great pool table and it plays great and smooth. The wife loves it
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: love it, was delivered in perfect condition with pool sticks and ball's
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Good table
customer_reviews.text: It's a very nice table just wish the felt was real
customer_reviews.author: Javier lara

customer_reviews.title: pool
customer_reviews.text: This table is sturdy and is easy to level. It is well worth the money and has been fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth P.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money for my young teen
customer_reviews.text: My son loves the table, and we are happy with the accessories that were provided. It was super easy to set up. My only issue is that I cannot seem to get it to level perfectly. I am still rating this 5 stars however, because I cannot fully conclude that this issue is due to the table, and not an uneven basement floor.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Norton

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Use it everyday. Family was against it said it was stupid.. but guess who else is using it everyday 👀. Really solid table. 1st one had issues. Company was willing to replace it. Table is not warped. Love it
customer_reviews.author: SeanRevIt

product_meta.title: GLD Products Fat Cat Trueshot 6 Ft. Pool Table | Folding Legs for Storage | 64-6035 model
product_meta.description: This innovative design couples compact design with stunning portability. For those that are tight on space and want to enjoy their favorite classic table game, the Trueshot is the perfect solution
feature_bullets: Your purchase includes One GLD Fat Cat Trueshot Pool Table of 6 ft. | Set of billiard balls, Two cues, One billiard brush, One ball triangle and Two chalks | A case is not included
Pool table dimensions – 76” L x 43” W x 32” H | Weight – 114 lbs. | Balls (each) – 2.25” Diameter | Cues (each) – 57” | Playing table thickness – ½” | Indoor only
Compact design allows you to enjoy your favorite game in spaces you never thought possible
High quality building materials allow for lightweight play and portability without sacrificing strength
The perfect size for younger players learning the fun of pool | Sleek black cloth complements any room decor, from traditional to contemporary

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
